data: SUS Perinatal Injectable Opioid Agonist Treatment (iOAT) HYDROmorphone Titration or Maintenance
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Consider consult with site specific addiction service or provincial addiction Rapid Access to Consultative Expertise (RACE) line
Only providers who have satisfied their provincial college requirements can prescribe injectable opioid agonist treatment for opioid use disorder
Patient Care
Refer to Injectable Opioid Agonist Therapy (iOAT) Protocol
Insert Peripheral IV (Intravenous) Catheter
T;N
Notify Treating Provider
If IV access is lost, contact provider for IM HYDROmorphone orders immediately
Communication Order
If previous dose delayed, proceed with next iOAT dose as long as it is separated by 3 hours
Medications
Alert patients' community pharmacy of hospitalization and consider discontinuation of community injectable opioid agonist treatment prescription if ordering in hospital
Please assess the possible need for dose adjustment if patient has been off injectable opioid agonist treatment for greater than 24 hours
Discontinue all previous hospital HYDROmorphone orders prior to initiating injectable opioid agonist treatment
Select HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL for doses of 25 mg or greater. Select HYDROmorphone 10 mg/mL for doses less than 25 mg
IV HYDROmorphone Titration
Day 1
HYDROmorphone 10 mg/mL inj
10 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: 0800
HYDROmorphone 10 mg/mL inj
20 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: 1200
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
30 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: 1600
Day 2
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
40 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+1;0800
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
50 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+1;1200
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
60 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+1;1600
Day 3
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
70 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;0800
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
80 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;1200
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
90 mg, IV, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;1600

HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj

HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
60 mg, IM, once, drug form: inj, start: T+1;1600
Day 3
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
70 mg, IM, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;0800
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
80 mg, IM, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;1200
HYDROmorphone 50 mg/mL inj
90 mg, IM, once, drug form: inj, start: T+2;1600
HYDROmorphone Titration Top Up Dose
HYDROmorphone 10 mg/mL inj
10 mg, IV, as directed, order duration: 9 doses or times, drug form: inj
HYDROmorphone 10 mg/mL inj
10 mg, IM, as directed, order duration: 9 doses or times, drug form: inj
